pages.text: $(li)The Diamond Hoe is the upgrade of the $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/iron_hoe)Iron Hoe$(/l).$(br)$(li)It has a greater durability than the last one.

pages.name: Diamond Hoe
pages.text: You can right click in a Grass or Dirt block while you are holding it in your hand to create Farmland.
